title: Sports Season, Megan Fox/MGK and Rod the Millenial God
description:
On the show this week, Lauren is joined by Rod, the TikTok and Instagram star who’s everyone’s favorite coworker. They predict the next nostalgic trends to return, talk work from humor and Rod reveals the mysteries of the inner workings of TikTok. Lauren also dubs the "Chic of the Week" (believe it or not: Megan Fox and MGK’s unforgettable GQ profile) and "Shit of the Week" (Meghan Trainor’s two toilets). Plus, we debut a new phrase: just sayin’!
Watch the podcast on YouTube: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyYT
Watch the podcast on IG: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyIG
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or by using this link: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyPodcast

Follow Lauren on IG

Follow Lauren on Twitter
